markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Drake Skeleton](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1903)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Moving with sinuous grace, these flying [drake](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=36) skeletons are held aloft by rotting membranes stretched between their bony wings. Although just as mindless as other skeletons, skeletal drakes maintain much of the draconic ferocity and raw spite they possessed in life, allowing them to attack viciously.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 24

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 19
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 8">[Drake Skeleton](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1903)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
<trait label="Skeleton" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=236" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 148

**Perception** +14; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +14, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +18, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +16

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +4

**Con** +4

**Int** -5

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -1
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 26 

**Fort** +16 

**Ref** +14 

**Will** +12 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 130
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

</row>

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Resistances**
[cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) 10, [electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56) 10, [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) 10, piercing 10, slashing 10

**Fragile Wings** When the drake skeleton is reduced to fewer than half its Hit Points, it can no longer fly. If it's aloft when this happens, it crashes immediately but can use the tatters of its wings to soften the landing, treating the fall as 20 feet shorter to calculate [falling damage](/Rules.aspx?ID=402).

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, fly 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fangs +20,
**Damage** 2d8+12 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tail +20 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d4+12 bludgeoning

**Draconic Frenzy** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The skeletal drake makes two Fangs Strikes and one Tail Strike in any order.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-92" />
name: Drake Skeleton

Although just as mindless as other skeletons, skeletal drakes maintain much of the draconic ferocity and raw spite they possessed in life, allowing them to attack viciously. If it's aloft when this happens, it crashes immediately but can use the tatters of its wings to soften the landing, treating the fall as 20 feet shorter to calculate falling damage. --- Speed 20 feet, fly 40 feet Melee Single Action fangs +20, Damage 2d8+12 piercing Melee Single Action tail +20 (reach 10 feet), Damage 2d4+12 bludgeoning Draconic Frenzy Two Actions The skeletal drake makes two Fangs Strikes and one Tail Strike in any order.
